svg.text: Start Here │ ▼ ┌─────────────────────┐ │ What type of metric?│ └─────────────────────┘ │ ┌──────────────────┼──────────────────┐ ▼ ▼ ▼ Binary/Rate Continuous Count (conversion rate) (revenue, time) (page views) │ │ │ ▼ ▼ ▼ ┌───────────────┐ ┌───────────────┐ ┌───────────────┐ │ Two-proportion│ │ T-test or │ │ Poisson │ │ Z-test │ │ Welch's │ │ or │ │ │ │ t-test │ │ Negative Bin. │ └───────────────┘ └───────────────┘ └───────────────┘ │ │ │ ▼ ▼ ▼ Small samples? High variance? Overdispersed? Yes ──▶ Fisher's Yes ──▶ Mann-Whitney Yes ──▶ Neg. Binomial Exact (non-parametric)
